comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Afraid I'm going to _have to_ take the day off again due to a nasty lingering cold. I actually skipped the Bolder Boulder because of it. Bummer! But thanks to a hand-me-down from LeCarla, Olivia rode a bike for the first time over the weekend. She loved tooling around the neighborhood on her training wheels and I can't wait 'til she can join the Frenz on a ride. Don't worry Dave, it will be a few years until she's breathing down your neck. It was also great to hear her utter a universal biker's complaint: my butt hurts. It was a very proud moment for this dad. -Greg

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: JG and I got to the creek crossing on the Royal Arch trail today. All the rain has cloaked the foothills trails in deep green and it's absolutely beautiful up there right now. It always strikes me as ironic that the trails are mostly deserted on the prettiest days. A little rain or snow or sub-zero weather inevitably weeds out the bulk of the "outdoor enthusiasts," and leaves us diehards with plenty of elbow room. I'm not complaining.

comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Can we say "Butt" on the Frenzy? Perhaps this will end up being rendered as bu!#. Funny one, Greg...
